title: Looking at the Science of Sunglasses
content: The sunglasses at the dollar store feel flimsy, yet I buy a pair.
author: Jonathan Jarry

title: Eyeglasses
content: Eyeglasses, lenses set in frames for wearing in front of the eyes to aid vision or to correct such defects of vision as myopia, hyperopia, and astigmatism.
author: Roger Bacon
